channel.title: How do U make "unjail work and Ipban"
channel.description: i was wondering how do u make unjail and ipban work.. ? on a delta based souce thanks ~Pktw1nz~![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 18, 2008, 11:59:26 am[/size][hr]COME ON HELP!

item.title: How do U make "unjail work and Ipban"
item.dc:creator: @99_Magic_George 99 Magic / George
item.description:
@99_Magic_George wrote:

[quote=“grimreaper61, post:8, topic:251190”][quote author=99 Magic / George link=topic=331483.msg2626055#msg2626055 date=1231794365]
Coding is a first timer for me and i need to know where i should paste this info. Answer back please.
[/quote]
gtfo off his thread first of all and make your own. You search for just a command say ctrl+f search for ban(as all servers have it for the most part) then at the end of a command add yours. next time make your own thread instead of using someone elses please.[/quote]

I’m talking about unjailing, and i didn’t know i was doing anything wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: How do U make "unjail work and Ipban"
item.dc:creator: @alexander_spicer alexander spicer
item.description:
@alexander_spicer wrote:

Look for this peice of code in clickingMost.java
in case 9154 look for this

if(c.action == 1){ c.sM("Suspicious activity!"); break; }
That is the logging out problem, best way to deal with it is just to delete/edit it out.

Here is the above command posted by Xile Maizez changed around a bit, and fixed up:

if (command.startsWith("unjail") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 1) { String name = command.substring(7); client p = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; p.resetPos(); p.action = 0; p.sM("You have been unjailed by "+playerName+"!"); sM("You have successfully unjailed "+p.playerName+"."); return; }

Enjoy, if you have any more problems, post them here and I’ll check back on this topic later.

Read full topic
item.source: How do U make "unjail work and Ipban"

item.title: How do U make "unjail work and Ipban"
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

Kk, This is the unjail code:

if (command.startsWith("unjail") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 1) { 
            String name = command.substring(7); 
            client p = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; 
               p.toX = 3104; 
               p.toY = 9312; 
            p.teleblock = false; 
               p.sM("Ahhh! feel the fresh air! Do not break the rules again!"); 
            updateRequired = true; 
            appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

Change the X and Y coordinates to wherever you want.
Here’s IP Ban:

            if (command.startsWith("ipban") && playerRights >= 1) {
                try {
                    String otherPName = command.substring(6);
                    int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                    if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                        client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

			p.writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, "ipbans");
			p.disconnected = true;
			sM("You have ipbanned "+p.playerName+"!");
                    } else { 
                       sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                    }
                } catch (Exception e) { 
                    sM("Try entering a name you want to ip ban..");
                }
            }

You can change the player rights, but i leave it on 1 in case of SYI’ers even though I have anti SYI’er, just in case.

Read full topic
